Jan 22: GM Andrew Berry said Monday that the Browns intend to bring back Chubb (knee) for the 2024 season, despite his current health and contract situation, Jake Trotter of ESPN.com reports.
Jan 17: Tillman (concussion) finished the 2023 season with 21 catches for 224 yards on 44 targets and added an eight-yard run.
Jan 17: Strong (back) had 63 carries for 291 yards and one touchdown to go with five catches for 47 yards on eight targets while appearing in all 17 regular-season games.
Jan 15: Bitonio suffered a high-ankle sprain in Saturday's wild-card loss to the Texans, Nate Ulrich of the Akron Beacon Journal reports.

Jan 14: Browns head coach Kevin Stefanski said Sunday that Watson (shoulder) is expected be fully recovered from shoulder surgery by the spring, Jake Trotter of ESPN.com reports. "He's doing great in rehab," Stefanski said. "I'm confident he'll be ready to roll [for OTAs]."
Jan 14: Walker will not need surgery to repair a knee injury that put him on IR on Jan. 5 and ended his season early, Jake Trotter of ESPN.com reports.
Jan 11: Delpit (groin) won't be activated off injured reserve ahead of Cleveland's wild-card matchup versus the Texans on Saturday, Jake Trotter of ESPN reports.
Jan 8: Woods (Achilles) had his suspension lifted by the NFL on Monday, per the NFL's transaction log.

Jan 8: Linsley said Monday that he's "99 percent" sure he'll retire during the offseason, Eric Smith of the Chargers' official site reports.
Jan 7: Pipkins is questionable to return to Sunday's matchup with the Chiefs due to a knee injury.

Dec 9: Bailey (back) was placed on injured reserve Saturday.

Jan 8: Palmer, who left Sunday's 13-12 loss to the Chiefs early with a knee injury, tallied 38 receptions for 581 receiving yards and two touchdowns across 10 games during the 2023 season.

Jan 8: Everett, who was forced out of Sunday's 13-12 loss to the Chiefs due to a knee injury, finished the 2023 campaign with 51 catches (on 70 targets) for 411 yards and three touchdowns in 15 games.
Jan 8: Linsley said Monday that he's "99 percent" sure he'll retire during the offseason, Eric Smith of the Chargers' official site reports.
Jan 7: Pipkins is questionable to return to Sunday's matchup with the Chiefs due to a knee injury.
Jan 6: Muse (knee) has been downgraded to out ahead of Sunday's game against the Chiefs, Fernando Ramirez of The Sporting Tribune reports.
Jan 6: The Chargers placed Hollins (shoulder) on injured reserve Saturday, Fernando Ramirez of The Sporting Tribune reports.
Jan 5: Bosa (foot) will not play Sunday against the Chiefs.
Dec 18: Clapp (knee) was placed on injured reserve by the Chargers on Monday, Daniel Popper of The Athletic reports.
Dec 12: The Chargers announced that Herbert will undergo surgery Tuesday to repair a fracture to his right index finger and has been placed on injured reserve.
Dec 9: Bailey (back) was placed on injured reserve Saturday.

Nov 16: Rumph announced Thursday via his personal Instagram account that he underwent successful surgery to address a broken foot suffered ahead of Sunday's 41-38 loss to the Lions, Kris Rhim of ESPN.com reports.
Nov 8: Layne announced Wednesday via his personal Instagram account that he underwent successful surgery to repair a torn ACL, Kris Rhim of ESPN.com reports.
Oct 26: Williams underwent surgery Wednesday to repair the torn ACL in his left knee and is expected to be ready for the start of training camp next summer, Ian Rapoport of NFL Network reports.

Jan 27: Brown successfully underwent surgery for his ACL on Saturday, Brooks Kubena of The Athletic reports.
Jan 19: Blankenship (groin) appeared in 15 regular-season games this season, leading the Eagles in interceptions (three), solo tackles (79) and total tackles (113).
Jan 17: Slay said Wednesday that his back injury isn't serious and he'll be sidelined for three weeks, Jeff McLane of The Philadelphia Inquirer reports.

Jan 17: Dean said Wednesday that he still has three weeks left of wearing a walking boot after having Lisfranc surgery on his left foot, and it remains to be seen whether he will be healthy in time to participate in OTAs, Brooks Kubena of The Athletic reports.
Jan 17: Jones caught all three of his targets for 22 yards in the Eagles' 32-9 loss to the Buccaneers on Monday in the wild-card round before exiting with a concussion.

Jan 17: Brown (knee) finished the 2023 regular season with 106 catches on 158 targets for 1,456 yards and seven touchdowns over 17 games. He played in all 17 regular-season games but missed the 32-9 wild-card round loss to the Buccaneers due to a knee injury.
Dec 30: The Eagles placed Okwuegbunam (hamstring) on injured reserve Saturday.
Dec 5: Evans' (knee) 21-day practice window expired Tuesday, which means he will spend the rest of the season on injured reserve, Aaron Wilson of KPRC 2 Houston reports.

Aug 20: McPhearson (Achilles) reverted to injured reserve Sunday, Adam Caplan of SiriusXM NFL Radio reports.
Aug 14: The Eagles placed Bradley (Achilles) on injured reserve Monday, Martin Frank of The Delaware News Journal reports.

Jan 17: Dean said Wednesday that he still has three weeks left of wearing a walking boot after having Lisfranc surgery on his left foot, and it remains to be seen whether he will be healthy in time to participate in OTAs, Brooks Kubena of The Athletic reports.
Jan 17: Jones caught all three of his targets for 22 yards in the Eagles' 32-9 loss to the Buccaneers on Monday in the wild-card round before exiting with a concussion.

Jan 17: Brown (knee) finished the 2023 regular season with 106 catches on 158 targets for 1,456 yards and seven touchdowns over 17 games. He played in all 17 regular-season games but missed the 32-9 wild-card round loss to the Buccaneers due to a knee injury.
Dec 30: The Eagles placed Okwuegbunam (hamstring) on injured reserve Saturday.
Dec 5: Evans' (knee) 21-day practice window expired Tuesday, which means he will spend the rest of the season on injured reserve, Aaron Wilson of KPRC 2 Houston reports.

Aug 20: McPhearson (Achilles) reverted to injured reserve Sunday, Adam Caplan of SiriusXM NFL Radio reports.
Aug 14: The Eagles placed Bradley (Achilles) on injured reserve Monday, Martin Frank of The Delaware News Journal reports.
